item.title: Death touched darts
item.dc:creator: @s_o_p_p_y s o p p y
item.description:
@s_o_p_p_y wrote:

Right here are the 3 codes I have added for Deathtouched darts below. When people vote they receive two darts. People just kill Nex with it and when they are wearing Ava’s device they do not loose darts and it operates like in real Runescape. So people can achieve over 10 kills from a single dart. Please help me and tell me how to disable this. Thank you

				if (weaponName.contains("deathtouched dart")) {
				    if (target instanceof Player) {
				        Player p2 = (Player) target;
				        p2.stopAll();
				    } else {
				    	NPC n = (NPC) target;
							World.sendProjectile(player, n, 3429, 41, 36, 50, 0, 15, 0);
							n.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(3428));
				            n.setCapDamage(200000);
				            n.applyHit(new Hit(player, n.getHitpoints(), HitLook.CRITICAL_DAMAGE));
				            player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData();
				    	}
					}

and

						&& ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(capeId)
						.getName().contains("Ava's") || weaponId == 25202)

and

                                                  CRITICAL_DAMAGE(11)

Read full topic
